image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Ohio; born in Youngstown, Mahoning County, Ohio, October 5, 1969; graduated from Ursuline High School, Youngstown, Ohio, 1988; B.S., St. Bonaventure University, St. Bonaventure, N.Y., 1992; M.A., Webster University, St. Louis, Mo., 1996; M.P.A., Webster University, St. Louis, Mo., 1996; United States Air Force, 1994-1998; Ohio Air National Guard, 1998-2000; Air Force Reserve, 2000-present; member, Ohio state house of representatives, 2001-2007; member, Ohio state senate, 2007-2008; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress (January 3, 2009-January 3, 2011); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010.

researchRecord.name: In the Ohio General Assembly House of Representatives records, 2005-2006, 0.17 cubic foot.
researchRecord.description: This series contains press releases, statements and advisories and bill files maintained by Representative Boccieri.
